#include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
const float f = 16777214;
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
printf("%f\n", f + i);
}

const double d = 9007199254740989;
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
printf("%lf\n", d + i);
}

return 0;
}

#include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
const int a[] = { 1, 2, 3 };

for (size_t i = 2; i >= 0; i--) {
printf("%d", a[i]);
}

return 0;
}
